channel.title: Saratoga Springs|Utah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Saratoga Springs|Utah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing). Turn right on UT-145 for access to UT-73.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi. Continue south on UT-68 to Elberta.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8750 North
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8750 North to Cedar Fort, Eagle Mountain, and Camp Floyd State Park and Museum.

item.title: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing) in Saratoga Springs. Use UT-145 west to UT-73; UT-145 east to I-15.

item.title: UT-68 North approaching UT-145
item.description: UT-68 North approaching UT-145 in Saratoga Springs.
